Unicron/Vehement/Sun Crusher/Reflector/Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark Claw/
The Protectobots/Shockwave:




Unicron turned around, firing a single optic blast, the other missile blowing 
up against his chest.  He laughed, raising a hand, three laser bolts lancing 
out from the palm at FZ's sternum.

Raising the other arm, he launched off an ES-seeking missile at the clone's 
left knee joint.

---

Vehement flew hard left firing off a couple optic blasts, intercepting the 
missiles, the two EMP bolts striking his chest, being absorbed by a part of 
his tattered Archbishop robes that were still in good condition.

Raising both arms together, he fired a large invisible sonic wave that shot 
out at Kilfest's torso, the wave designed to badly damage internal circuitry 
when used on a target enough.

---

Sun Crusher fired off five optic blasts on an intercept course with the 
inbound missiles, pulling hard left in his flight, making sure he stays in 
the general direction of the northeast towards "Red Hero".  One missile 
blasted him in the chest, knocking him back in the air, extra power to both 
boosters in his feet allowing him to regain his balance in the air, blasting 
forward at an accellerated speed.

Raising a wrist he launched off two energy-signature seeking missiles at 
Greven.  In his left hand appeared a grenade launcher from subspace.  Already 
set to explode on impact, he fired off two of the small explosives downward 
towards Greven.

---

Reflector raised a wrist, making quick modifications to a missile he launched 
it, exploding a few feet in front of the other missiles to block them.  He 
fired six rapid blasts in the general direction of the missiles just in case.

He raised his left arm, firing down a spray of acid at Endbringer, raising 
the same twin-barreled mounted launcher attached to his wrist that had been 
fired to intercept the enemy missiles, firing one energy-signature seeking 
missile from one barrel down at Endbringer, two regular missiles down at the 
Predacon immediately after, the Brotherhood member staying on course.

------

Hot Spot watched as two CR chambers opened and he yelled.  "Come on!  Follow 
me!  Battle outside, no time to explain!" he yelled, running full speed.

Blades looked to First Aid and gave a confused look.  "Didn't...we just fight 
in a battle?"

"Yeah, we better hurry though." the medic replied, going after Hot Spot with 
Blades in tow.

------

Demon Wulf felt to blasts strike his right knee and he almost feel, but with 
a free hand he pushed himself back up.  Opening his mouth he fired off a long 
burs to flames at Streetwise.

---

Flesh Ripper formed a black orb in his hand and threw it at the Cybertronian 
Fire.

---

Dark Claw launched off two more missiles at the Cybertronian Fire from his 
ports, moving forward a meter.

---

Groove slowly got to a knee, taking out a charge and throwing at the space in 
between Flesh Ripper's feet.

---

Streetwise fell to his back as the flames hit him full force charring his 
armor.  He didn't get up.

---

Shockwave made a barrell roll and armed two more missiles.
